name: Exfoliating Gel
description: This exfoliating gel with its high concentration of glycolic acid stimulates the skin’s cell renewal and reduces impurities, wrinkles and fine lines, so the skin regains its natural glow and is left soft, smooth and rejuvenated.

name: Vitamin C Brightening Serum
description: This powerful 10% concentration vitamin C formula delivers a brightening and firming boost. The effective combination of two types of active vitamin C reduces the appearance of dark spots and hyperpigmentation.

name: BHA Salicylic Acid Exfoliating Toner
description: This deep-cleansing toner with 2% salicylic acid unclogs pores, reduces impurities and the appearance of fine lines, so the skin regains its natural glow and is left soft, smooth and more radiant-looking.

name: Multi Peptide Lifting Filler
description: This anti-ageing filling serum corrects all types of wrinkles and fine lines with its result-driven formula packed with peptides and hyaluronic filler leaving the skin smooth, firm and youthful.

name: Anti-ageing Night Cream
description: This highly concentrated anti-ageing night cream with Granactive Retinoid® (vitamin A), ceramides and hyaluronic acid effectively reduces signs of ageing, improves skin structure and gives a moisturising boost that lasts up to 72 hours.

name: Bakuchiol Face Oil
description: This highly concentrated anti-ageing face oil, with bakuchiol, vitamin C and powerful antioxidants, boosts your skin’s natural production of collagen, reduces fine lines and wrinkles and leaves your skin silky smooth.

name: Micellar Water
description: Micellar Water is an unique formula containing micelle molecules and hyaluronic acid gently but effectively removes makeup, dirt and impurities, leaving the skin clean, refreshed and naturally balanced. Micelles are tiny spherical molecules that bind dirt, makeup and other impurities and remove them from the skin. Hyaluronic acid reduces excess oil and is moisturising, helping the skin to retain its natural freshness and balance.

name: Refreshing Scrub Mask
description: This deep-cleansing scrub mask with glycolic acid, zinc and niacinamide (vitamin B3) removes impurities and excess oil while an effective combination of volcanic minerals, bamboo extract and black jojoba beads exfoliate your skin.

name: Hyaluronic Serum
description: This fast-absorbing serum with panthenol (vitamin B5) and hyaluronic acid with a low and medium molecular weight restores the skin’s elasticity, reduces fine lines and enhances the skin’s natural moisture balance.

name: White Tea Balancing Cream
description: This fast-absorbing serum with panthenol (vitamin B5) and hyaluronic acid with a low and medium molecular weight restores the skin’s elasticity, reduces fine lines and enhances the skin’s natural moisture balance.

name: Retinol Night Treatmen
description: This highly concentrated anti-ageing night cream with Granactive Retinoid® (vitamin A), ceramides and hyaluronic acid effectively reduces signs of ageing, improves skin structure and gives a moisturising boost that lasts up to 72 hours.

name: Hyaluronic Serum
description: This fast-absorbing serum with panthenol (vitamin B5) and hyaluronic acid with a low and medium molecular weight restores the skin’s elasticity, reduces fine lines and enhances the skin’s natural moisture balance.
